description: The specification file for a course instance.
title: Course instance information

___longName.description: The long name of this course instance (e.g., 'Spring 2015').

___timezone.description: The timezone for all date input and display (e.g., "America/Chicago", from the TZ column at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones).

___.+.description: The role for a given UID.

___userRoles.description: Special roles for specific users (anyone not listed is assumed to be a 'Student').

___allowAccess.description: List of access rules for the course instance. Access is permitted if any access rule is satisfied.

items.description: An access rule that permits people to access this course instance. All restrictions present in the rule must be satisfied for the rule to allow access.

___startDate.description: The earliest date on which access is permitted.

___role.description: The minimum user role required for access.

___institution.description: The institution from which access is permitted.

___endDate.description: The latest date on which access is permitted.

___uids.description: A list of UIDs, one of which is required for access
